mapper.select: select a.*,b.position from `gas-data` a left join `device-position` b on a.deviceNo= b.deviceNo and a.companyId = b.companyId where a.companyId = ${companyId} order by a.deviceNo asc;

SELECT deviceNo, gasLevel O2, O2Warning O2_state, gasLevel1 CH4, CH4Warning CH4_state, temperature, CASE when (100-(4100 - dePowerVoltage)*100/700) >= 100 then 100 when (100-(4100 - dePowerVoltage)*100/700) < 100 then (100-(4100 - dePowerVoltage)*100/700) END power , deTemp person_num FROM `gas-data` WHERE createTime >= date_add(now(), INTERVAL - 3 MINUTE) and companyId = ${companyId}; ORDER BY id ASC;
replace into `device-position` (deviceNo,companyId, position, updateTime) values (${deviceNo},${companyId}, #{position}, now());
